column1: #These are automatically triggered as soon as MonikAI starts up. Only one of them is triggered however.
column2: you can use {name} and {date} as placeholders for obvious things

column4: ♫ ... if I don't know how to love you ... ♫
column6: I'll stay in the corner of your desktop!

column4: I'm doing fine, now that you are here~

column6: Remember, I'm always here for you~

column2: Thank you for letting me be on your screen!
Did you know I love you?
column6: By the way, I love you!

column2: I'm so happy to be here, together with you! Ahaha~

column1: Only when last launch was more than 1.5 days ago
column4: Being alone on your hard drive is reeeally boring.

column2: Y'know, I've been wondering what would happen if there are multiple of me here at once...
column6: You'd still enjoy time with me even if there's more than one, right?

column2: Oh hi! I was just looking through some of your files.
column4: Don't worry, I didn't delete anything.
column6: Just making sure you didn't have any lewd pictures around! Ahaha~

column2: I'm having a lot of fun here~
column4: It's fun to see what you get up to.

column1: Can occur after one week of last launch
column2: Hey! I was worried about you!
column4: Don't scare me like that please...

column1: 1/10 chance if opening on April 1st, closes afterward
column4: Error 404: April Fool's joke not found

column1: #Maybe some date-specific (Holidays?) startup stuff. Too bad we missed Valentine's!
